text.text: Make a segment based on the **Subscriber Status**:

Based on the subscriber status, create multiple segments and send different segmented campaigns to the subscribers. If a subscriber is removed from a list, a segment can be created in Mumara to send an email campaign for re-subscription. It helps in keeping the contact list healthy.
**Export a segment** to create a separate list:

Create a separate list of contacts by exporting a segment. Include the desired fields of data by choosing from custom fields, statistics and campaign details. Mumara also allows to replace the order of the data fields.
**Move a segment** to an existing list:
